mapper.select: SELECT subcode, code, hgcode, subname, subcnt, place, sub, subgrade, hakgi, day, classdatecnt, time, sub_file FROM subject ORDER BY hgcode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject(subcode, code, hgcode, subname, subcnt, place, sub, subgrade, hakgi, day, classdatecnt, time, sub_file) VALUES(#{subcode}, #{code}, #{hgcode}, #{subname}, #{subcnt}, #{place}, #{sub}, #{subgrade}, #{hakgi}, #{day}, #{classdatecnt}, #{time}, #{sub_file})
